Title: Google Reveals Two New Web Crawlers
Description: Google has launched two new web crawlers: GoogleOther-Image & GoogleOther-Video.

Title: Why advertisers can no longer trust Google
Description: Article discusses the declining trust advertisers have in Google.

Title: EU asks Microsoft to provide information about Bing’s generative AI features
Description: The EU is requesting information from Microsoft about the risks of generative AI features in Bing.

Title: TikTok now testing 60-minute video uploads
Description: TikTok is currently testing the ability for users to upload videos up to 60 minutes long.

Title: Investment in martech companies down 87% vs. Q1 of 2023
Description: Investment in marketing technology companies has seen a significant drop compared to the first quarter of 2023.

Title: Microsoft faces EU pressure but avoids UK probe
Description: The EU is demanding information from Microsoft about Bing's generative AI, while the UK has chosen not to investigate its partnership with Mistral AI.

Title: How marketers are rolling out cookieless strategies in 2024
Description: Article explores how marketers are adapting to a cookieless future in their digital strategies.

Title: Remove Your Content From Google's AI Overviews
Description: Instructions on how to remove your content from Google's AI Overviews, a new feature in search results.

Title: EU warns Microsoft to give risk data on Bing AI or face fines
Description: The EU has threatened Microsoft with fines if they do not provide internal data on Bing's AI features and their potential risks related to elections.

Title: Google Ads AI Summaries Live For Some Advertisers
Description: Google Ads has launched a new AI-powered feature that summarizes campaign performance for some advertisers.

Title: Order with Google For Food Delivery Going Away End Of June
Description: The 'Order with Google' feature for food delivery services will be discontinued at the end of June.

Title: Google Locks Down Complaints Of Image Thumbnails Not Showing In Search
Description: Google has stopped responding to complaints on their support forums about ongoing issues with image thumbnails not appearing in search results.

Title: Mikhail Parakhin, Former Microsoft Bing Head, Joins Perplexity Advisor Board
Description: Mikhail Parakhin, former head of Bing Search at Microsoft, has joined the advisory board of Perplexity, an AI search startup.

Title: Microsoft PC Manager Promotes Bing for 'PC Repair'
Description: Microsoft's PC Manager app suggests switching to Bing as the default search engine as a way to 'repair' Windows devices.

Title: EU Investigates Bing's AI Risks
Description: The European Commission demands Microsoft provide information about Bing's generative AI features, including potential risks to electoral processes.

Title: Google Adds New Web Crawlers
Description: Google introduced two new web crawlers, 'GoogleOther-Image' and 'GoogleOther-Video', for enhanced image and video indexing.

Title: Former Bing Head Joins Perplexity
Description: Mikhail Parakhin, former head of Bing Search at Microsoft, joins the advisory board of AI search engine Perplexity.

Title: Google Ads Introduces AI Summaries
Description: Google Ads is rolling out AI-powered summaries to provide concise overviews of campaign performance for advertisers.

Title: TikTok Tests 60-Minute Videos
Description: TikTok is experimenting with longer video uploads, allowing users to create videos up to 60 minutes in length.

Title: Martech Investment Declines
Description: Investment in martech companies dropped significantly in the first quarter of 2024 compared to the same period in 2023.

Title: Marketers Adopt Cookieless Strategies
Description: With the impending demise of third-party cookies, marketers are implementing new strategies to target audiences and measure campaign effectiveness.

Title: Removing Content from Google's AI Overviews
Description: Users can now remove their content from Google's AI Overviews, a new feature providing AI-generated summaries, using techniques like the 'nosnippet' tag.

Title: 'Order with Google' for Food Delivery Ends
Description: Google is discontinuing its 'Order with Google' feature for food delivery, ending integration with platforms like Uber Eats and DoorDash.

Title: Google Addresses Image Thumbnail Issues
Description: Google acknowledges complaints about missing image thumbnails in search results, assuring users they are aware of the problem and working on a solution.

Title: EU demands more information from Microsoft on Bing's AI risks or face fines
Description: The European Commission has given Microsoft a deadline of May 27 to provide information about the risks associated with generative AI in its Bing search engine, including concerns about deepfakes and false news. Failure to comply could result in fines.

Title: Microsoft's PC Manager App Promotes Bing as a 'PC Repair' Solution
Description: Microsoft's PC Manager app recommends using Bing as the default search engine as part of its PC optimization process, prompting criticism for pushing its search engine as a solution for system issues.

Title: Mikhail Parakhin, Former Head of Bing, Joins Perplexity's Advisory Board
Description: Former Bing Search, AI, and Ads Head, Mikhail Parakhin, has joined the advisory board of Perplexity, an AI search startup, signaling a potential shift in the AI search landscape.

Title: Google Adds Two New Web Crawlers: GoogleOther-Image & GoogleOther-Video
Description: Google has introduced two new web crawlers, GoogleOther-Image and GoogleOther-Video,  potentially impacting how images and videos are crawled and indexed by Google.

Title: 'Order with Google' for Food Delivery to End in June
Description: Google is discontinuing its 'Order with Google' feature for food delivery by the end of June, signaling a shift in its food delivery strategy.

Title: Google Locks Down Support Thread Regarding Image Thumbnail Issues
Description: Google has locked down a support thread discussing ongoing issues with image thumbnails not appearing in search results, acknowledging the problem but providing limited response to specific complaints.

Title: Google Ads AI Summaries Rolling Out to Some Advertisers
Description: Google Ads is rolling out AI-powered summaries to some advertisers, providing automated insights and analysis of campaign performance.

Title: TikTok Expands Video Length Limit with 60-minute Test
Description: TikTok is testing 60-minute video uploads, expanding its video length options and potentially attracting a wider range of content creators and viewers.

Title: Martech Investment Declines Sharply
Description: Investment in martech companies has dropped by 87% compared to the first quarter of 2023, indicating a significant slowdown in the martech sector.

Title: How Marketers are Adapting to Cookieless Strategies
Description: With the ongoing delay of third-party cookie deprecation, marketers are implementing cookieless strategies, including focusing on first-party data and exploring alternative solutions like contextual advertising.
